snippet.title: Amber Heard recognizes gender “bisexual” || Johnny Depp - Pirates of the Caribbean Talkshow
snippet.description:
#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #AmberHeardJohnnyDepp #AmberHeardbisexual

Hidden Radar

Amber Heard said: 'Parents cry when they know I love homosexuals'

Actress 'Aquaman' remembers difficult days when she first revealed to her family a bisexual.

Talking at the South By Southwest art festival in Texas on March 9, Amber Heard revealed that the most awkward thing about "coming out" about your gender is the moment facing your loved one. "They don't know how to accept it because of them, it's beyond normal standards," Amber said.

"I am from Austin, Texas. My father is a native of this region, a standard Southern man and I was raised in a pious family. As a gay, atheist and vegetarian, I remember When I told my parents about a relationship with a girl, they cried non-stop. "

Amber Heard is openly bisexual (love both men and women) in 2010 at the GLAAD awards ceremony (the award honors individuals and collectives contributing to the LGBT community). At that time, she was in love with female photographer Tasya Van Ree.

The channel used link below:

Track: Cadmium - Click & Scroll (feat. Eli Raain & Veronica Bravo) [NCS Release] Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds. Watch: https://youtu.be/0BNwmJIhEiU Free Download / Stream: http://ncs.io/ClickScroll
tags: Amber Heard recalls coming out as bisexual
Johnny Depp - Pirates of the Caribbean
